DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate macrophaging activity and immunologic profile of patients with Gaucher 's disease. For this, one blood sampling will be performed.
DOC.brief_title: Macrophagic Activation and Immunophenotypic Profile of Patients With Gaucher's Disease
DOC.criteria: Adults (age equal or above 18. Patients with Gaucher 's disease treated in the "Grand Ouest" competence center patients affiliated to social security Informed consent signed Children (age<18)
